attributes.background:
After watching Panorama Behind Bars BBC1 Monday 13th February 2017 I am absolutely disgusted with how the Prison Service is run and how offenders behave. A
Complete overhaul of UK Prisons and how they are run is required immediately. Ask the Military or ex Military to run this service.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
